init.title: Display Tools Options
init.description:
Update Display Tools settings.

**Base URL** - Leave empty for automatic detection (recommended).

Current detection priority:
1. User-configured URL (if set)
2. get_url() helper method
3. Internal URL (local network)
4. External URL (internet)
5. Localhost fallback
